conditional.translation[0].definitions[0: if an offer, agreement etc is conditional, it will only be done if something else happens first

conditional.translation[0].definitions[1: in grammar, a conditional sentence is one that begins with ‘if’ or ‘unless’ and expresses something that must be true or happen before something else can be true or happen
conditional.translation[1].definitions[0: a sentence or clause that is expressed in a conditional form
